taxonomicnotes: Large morphological interpopulation variability and differences in chromosome numbers suggest that several species may be confused under the name M. anguillicaudatus. Some populations from Viet Nam earlier identified as this species are in fact M. multimaculatus and M. tonkinensis.
rationale: A widespread species that has been very widely introduced. Although there is some evidence that the species has declined in parts of the species' native range, the species is considered Least Concern at present.
